targets.expr: homers_plex_session_progress * on(name, user, title) group_left(state, media_type, platform, decision, quality) homers_plex_session_info
homers_tautulli_session_progress * on(user, title) group_left(state, media_type, quality, quality_profile, video_stream) homers_tautulli_session_info
homers_plex_library_grandchild_count * on(name, library_name, library_type) group_left() homers_plex_library_child_count
homers_radarr_movie_available and on(name, title) homers_radarr_movie_has_file == 0 and on(name, title) homers_radarr_movie_monitored == 1
